item.title: 7 Best Teas for Losing Weight and Protect Your Body
item.description: The next time you pop in to your favorite coffee bar, consider skipping the pumpkin-spice lattes, caramel macchiatos, and cold-brew iced coffees; instead, go for a soothing, steaming cup of tea. Because in addition to teaâ€™s well-known power to soothe sore throats and even help prevent cancer and diabetes, it could actually help you drop a few pounds. “Drinking tea may support weight loss or weight maintenance because it fills the void of beverages that are high in sugar and calories,” says Josh Axe, D.
